title: Which fictional character are you often compared to? - Quora

response.answer_text: Funny enough I see someone has already picked my best friend. Well if you haven't guessed, this is who I'm always compared to:  For reference, here is a photo of me:  Wait… that's not right.  (This is the only photo I could find of me from last year with my glasses on and without my beard… FML) Anyway, looking back on it now I can kind of see it, but man did it piss me off. My mates knew how shit I thought the show is, so that just made it even worse. I suppose personality-wise I can see more of a resemblance than appearance, but eh, I like to think I'm nerdier than Leonard. I may as well have just done a #roast me. P.S My eyebrows are way more magnificent than his.

Kouse Arima. Everyone in my school compares me to the Your Lie In April protagonist. However, I myself cannot argue. Know why? We have freakishly similar parallels. Glasses, check. Black, mid length hair, check. Played piano, was pretty good, known around my area for it, check. Stopped playing because of trauma at one point, check. Began to play again after someone “showed me the light”, check. That person was a violinist, check. Man, that story should have just been about my life…
